byline.contributor: Majd Al Waheidi contributed reporting from Gaza.
byline.original: By ISABEL KERSHNER and JODI RUDOREN

abstract: Amnesty International says Hamas killed at least 23 Palestinians accused of collaborating with Israel in 2014 Gaza Strip war, and tortured dozens of others.
lead_paragraph: An Amnesty International report on last summer’s Gaza war says there were at least 23 extrajudicial killings of Palestinians accused of collaborating with Israel.

headline.main: Hamas Is Accused of Using Gaza War as Cover to Torture and Kill Palestinians
headline.print_headline: Hamas Is Accused of Killing and Torturing in Gaza

snippet: An Amnesty International report on last summer’s Gaza war says there were at least 23 extrajudicial killings of Palestinians accused of collaborating with Israel.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
